projects.title: MizuSkin – AI-Powered Social Skincare App
projects.description: iOS skincare app using SwiftUI and cloud functions to provide AI-powered recommendations, personalized routines, and social sharing features.
highlights: Built SwiftUI iOS app with an AI-backed recommendation flow.
Designed a cloud-integrated architecture with Azure Functions and storage services.
Implemented secure authentication and CI/CD pipelines.

projects.title: PhreekyNoises – Social Music Tracking App
projects.description: Full-stack web app that tracks music habits via Spotify API, including authentication, music history, and friend connections.
highlights: Integrated Spotify API for music history and profile data.
Implemented auth, database-backed history, and friend connections.
Managed development using an Agile Scrum board.
